Package api_p

Interface IExagonProtocolMapper

public interface IExagonProtocolMapper
A specification for classes that represent an Exagon protocol mapper in the system.

An Exagon protocol mapper is responsible for converting data between internal and external representations of the network events. It is the bridge between the business logic (which only understands internal representations) and the Exagon stack (which only understands external representations).

Its methods are called by Exagon, but this requires that this protocol mapper is registered through a IExagon#registerConnection or IExagon#registerExternalServer.

Since:
5.0
See Also:
  • IExagon.registerConnection(api_e.enums.ExagonProtocolEnum, api_e.configuration.ExagonStackConfiguration, api_p.IExagonProtocolMapper)
  • IExagon.registerExternalServer(api_e.enums.ExagonProtocolEnum, api_e.configuration.ExagonStackConfiguration, api_p.IExagonProtocolMapper)

  • Method Details

    • convertExternalRequest

      List<Object> convertExternalRequest(StackEvent externalRequest) throws UnsupportedOperationException
      Converts an externalRequest into a list of internal requests.

      Should be implemented when applied in any registerConnection. Otherwise, should throw UnsupportedOperationException.

      Parameters:
      externalRequest - the external request represented as a StackEvent
      Returns:
      the list of internal requests
      Throws:
      UnsupportedOperationException - if not implemented
      See Also:
      • IExagon.registerConnection(api_e.enums.ExagonProtocolEnum, api_e.configuration.ExagonStackConfiguration, api_p.IExagonProtocolMapper)

      Should be implemented when applied in any registerConnection. Otherwise, should throw UnsupportedOperationException.

      Parameters:
      internalReply - the internal reply sent through IExagonExternalServer.send
      Returns:
      the external reply represented as a StackEvent

      UnsupportedOperationException - if not implemented

      Object convertExternalReply(StackEvent externalReply) throws UnsupportedOperationException
      Converts a externalReply into an internal reply.

      Should be implemented when applied in any registerExternalServer. Otherwise, should throw UnsupportedOperationException.

      Parameters:
      externalReply - the external reply
      Returns:

      UnsupportedOperationException - if not implemented
